HR Audits & Policy Reframing

  • Ensuring 100% compliance with all laws, regulations and global HR best practise along the entire HR value chain, such as

  • Recruitment

  • Onboarding

  • Performance Management

  • Compensation & Benefits

  • Rewards and Recognition

  • Learning and Development

  • Employee Happiness & Engagement

  • Separation

Organizational Development

  • Engineering changes and improvement in HR processes and structures related to organization structures, performance management, talent management, diversity, employee wellness, and so on to fit into the business strategy to increase the organization’s competitiveness in order to create a business that wins in the marketplace.

HR Audits

  • Policy review

  • 100% compliance check with laws, regulations and HR best practice

  • Processes for high performance cultures

Job evaluations & Employee Productivity

  • Crafting Job Profiles
  • Objective performance appraisal systems and tools to enhance employee productivity

Employee Engagement

  • Employee engagement initiatives impacting team spirit

  • High performance work culture and happy conducive work environment aimed at attracting and retaining talent and creating positive employer brand in the wider market.

Meet Your Consultant Azmina Mulji

Qualifications

  • Global Diploma in Professional Coaching

  • MBA in HR Management (Heriot-Watt University UK)

  • Bachelors of Laws (UON Kenya)

  • Accredited Corporate Governance Auditor

  • Advocate of the High Court of Kenya

  • Member International Coaching Federation

  • Member Institute of Human Resource Management of Kenya

  • Member of the Law Soceity of Kenya

  • Member of the Institute of the Company Secretaries of Kenya

About

Azmina has 20+years as an expert HR practitioner where she has helped organizations turn around performance impacting their growth trajectory through bespoke HR interventions.She is enthralled about extending her expertise to corporations looking for increased and sustainable growth by providing top class HR consulting services wishing to perform par excellence. Her value proposition can be summed up in one statement: “To provide tailor-made interventions professionally and competently delivering beyond expectations for improved human capital processes, cost-efficiencies and a better bottom-line”.

About Us 📕

The Happy People Space has been created with a vision to make the world a happier place by partnering with organizations and individuals to help them fulfill their purpose, promoting their happiness and success. We provide bespoke HR consultancy and executive coaching services with transformational results validated by our clients. We promise to deliver services with authenticity, excellence, and value beyond expectations at pocket-friendly prices.
